subject: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Dear Pedro,
Many thanks for the quick response. As you already know, you need to
contact the processing bank and request more details about receiving your
payment. Also, note that you only have to pay the Notarization fee of $585
to complete the transfer process. Make no mistake, you can find the bank's
contact details below.

Contact the processing bank at the email below for quick and further action:
info@zenithbuk.com
Bank: Zenith Bank UK

Contact them now and make sure you get back to me for more directives to
follow, you need to be guided.

Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General
The United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services
United Nations Headquarters, New York City
Responsible for Internal Audits, Investigations, and Program Evaluation

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Hello Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your prompt response and the information provided. I appreciate your guidance in this matter.

I'm curious, could you please explain a bit more about the fee? What exactly is it for and why is it necessary for the transfer process?

Also, could you provide me with some more details about the processing bank? It would be great to know a bit more about them before making contact.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Dear Pedro,
Thank you for your email, as we informed you earlier, the Bank Notarization
Fee Charges are the responsibility of the beneficiary and that is the only
money you have to pay before your approved fund can be released to you. You
have no further payment to make except the Bank Notarization Fee of $585
Only.

The notarization fee fee is a bank processing charge which is a compulsory
fee.

So I want you to quickly contact the processing bank to know how and where
to transfer the fee to them, as to enable them to quickly have your funds
released to your bank account immediately.

You are also required to send your full bank account information to the
bank, current address, and international passport/ID card for
identification records. very important.

As quickly as the information is received, and the fee is paid, then your
fund will be fast and released to your account without further delay. you
have my word.

Contact the processing bank below for quick and further action:
info@zenithbuk.com
Bank: Zenith Bank UK

Get back to me immediately after you hear from the bank for more directives
and guidelines to follow, you need to be guided..

Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General
The United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services
United Nations Headquarters, New York City
Responsible for Internal Audits, Investigations, and Program Evaluation

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Dear Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your guidance in this matter.

I understand that there is a bank fee charge which needs to be paid before my approved fund can be released. However, could you please clarify what the exact amount of this fee is? 

You mentioned that I should contact the processing bank to know how and where to transfer the fee. Could you kindly provide me with their contact details or guide me on how I can get in touch with them?

Regarding the requirement of sending my full bank account details, current address, and passport ID card for records, I am afraid I cannot comply with this request due to privacy concerns. Is there any other way we can proceed without sharing such sensitive personal information?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Hello Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your detailed email. I appreciate the information about the Bank Fee Charges and understand that it's a compulsory fee for processing.

Before proceeding, could you please clarify a few things for me? What exactly does this bank processing charge cover? And why is it necessary to pay this fee before my approved fund can be released?

Also, I'm curious about how the process works after the fee is paid. How quickly can I expect my funds to be released into my account?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Dear Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information provided. I appreciate your guidance in this matter.

I understand that there is a bank fee charge which needs to be paid before my approved fund can be released. However, could you please clarify how much exactly this fee is? 

You mentioned that I should contact the processing bank to know how and where to transfer the fee. Could you kindly provide me with their contact details?

Regarding the requirement of sending my full bank account, current address, and passport ID card for records, I am afraid I cannot share such sensitive personal information via email due to security reasons. Is there any other secure way we can handle this?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Dear Pedro,
That is simple, the total fee is about $585 no other payment, as for your
details, you can only send your full bank details, and your ID card, that
is enough to start the process.

You can send the details to me, then I will help you do the processing.

Let me know if you need the agent bank details to transfer the Notarization
fee of $585 which is the only fee, or payment you will ever require before
your fund will be released to your account.

Sincerely yours,
Mr. Ben Swanson, Assistant Secretary-General
The United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services
United Nations Headquarters, New York City
Responsible for Internal Audits, Investigations, and Program Evaluation

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
Hello Mr. Ben Swanson,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's great to hear from you and the United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services. I'm quite intrigued by this process.

However, before we proceed, could you please explain a bit more about what this fee is for? And why do you need my full bank details and ID card? I'm just trying to understand the whole process better.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Pedro

Noted your email, you can contact me whenever you are ready to receive your

Mr. Swanson

subject: Re: Your 10.5 million dollars is ready
body:
